Original:

At 6 o'clock in the evening, it arrived at 5 minutes early. The iron door was half open. The 5-year-old child wanted to go to the trumpet. Ask the boss if he could borrow the toilet, he refused. After walking, I went up and endured it for a long time. As a result, the meal appetite was not good later, and I had urethritis.
The barbecue taste is ordinary, without baking fragrance, the air -conditioning wind blows too much headache, semi -open space, the water horse is super noisy, and you can't hear the same table.Although the interior decoration of the store, the audio of the TV screen in the store has been playing the Korean group MV, which is very incompatible.

Original:
▲ 可能有洗評價嫌疑
△ 不開發票
▲ 串烤（先炸後烤）
△ 週四公休（暫時）
▲ 現金支付
△ 附近自找停車場 / 格
▲ 自取串烤跟啤酒
△ 可內用 / 可外帶
▲ 內用禁煙
△ 提供洗手間
▲ 調味料自行取用
△ 啤酒小杯子自取
▲ 提供生啤
△ 餐具自取
▲ 一次店

串烤自行到前面取用，然後再給工作人員料理。方式跟味道都跟夜市差不多，只是有個地方可以讓客人坐，然後可內用。

啤酒雖然有生啤，但是我覺得啤酒機應該沒洗很勤勞，剛開的店，生啤酒就比百威、麒麟的玻璃瓶還要苦.. 這個不太合理。

玻璃杯也是跟混油的器皿或是共用菜瓜布，啤酒杯內緣都是泡沫.. 而且小杯子就是跟熱炒一樣沒有冰過，啤酒一倒下去就慢慢變成常溫啤酒..

平均一個人有喝酒，大概是 400 ~ 600 之間。整體來說就是如果想喝酒，想找個地方聊天可以來，但是料理跟酒單都不推，就是熱炒店換成夜市的串烤，但是比夜市費用高一些，因為提供內用座位。服務是還算客氣，但是平均值來說就是很普的一家店，料理不用特別期待，只有甜不辣跟豬血糕還勉強可以，肉類都不行，尤其是雞肉...雞味也太重... 剛開店但是沒有什麼優惠或是活動，可能一切都還在試水溫階段吧，可惜了，不推，一次就不會再回頭
EN:
▲ There may be suspicion of washing evaluation
△ No invoice is issued
▲ skewers (fried first and then grilled)
△ On Thursday Gongxie (temporarily)
▲ Cash payment
△ Find a parking lot / grid nearby
▲ Take skewers and beer
△ Can be used in it / can take out
▲ Internal smoking ban
△ Provide toilet
▲ Seasoning by itself
△ Beer small cup takes itself
▲ Provide raw beer
△ Consome
▲ One shop

String to bake to take it before, and then cook the staff.The method is similar to the night market, but there is a place to let the guests sit and then use it internally.

Although beer has raw beer, I think that the beer machine should not be washed very hard. The just opened stores, raw beer is more bitter than the glass bottle of Budweiser and Kirin .. This is not reasonable.

The glass cup is also a bubble with a mixed utensils or a coexistence of vegetables. The inner edge of the beer glass is foam .. The small cup is just like the hot fry. The beer slowly turns into room temperature beer as soon as it falls ..

On average, one person has a drink, about 400 ~ 600.Overall, if you want to drink, you can find a place to chat, but the cooking and the wine list are not pushed, that is, the hot speculation shop is replaced by the skewers of the night market, but it costs higher than the night market because it provides internal seats.The service is pretty polite, but the average value is a very universal store. You don't have to look forward to cooking. Only sweet, not spicy, and pig blood cakes. It's heavy ... I just opened a store but there is no discount or activity, maybe everything is still at the temperature of the water temperature, but unfortunate
